dcterms:creator: N.O. Hodas
K. Lerman
dcterms:description: This dataset contains the tweets with URLs posted in Oct, 2010. The tweets with the same URL are regarded as an information cascade, thus their publishers are the activated users in this cascade.
dcterms:title: Twitter

dcterms:creator: E. Zhong
W. Fan
J. Wang
L. Xiao
Y. Li
dcterms:description: This dataset is from a review sharing website for various resources including books, movies, and music. Each book is regarded as a piece of information, and a user is activated and joins the cascade of a book if they have read it.
dcterms:title: Douban

dcterms:creator: J. Leskovec
L. Backstrom
J. Kleinberg
dcterms:description: This dataset collects massive news stories and blogs from online websites and tracks popular quotes and phrases as memes. Each meme is treated as a piece of information and each website URL as an activated user.
dcterms:title: MemeTracker
